mapper.insert: insert into gm_comment (ORDER_DETAIL_ID, USER_ID, GOODS_ID, COMMENT_CUSTOMER_NUMBER, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_IMAGES, CREATE_TIME) values( #{orderDetailId}, #{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{commentCustomerNumber}, #{commentContent}, #{commentImages}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_DETAIL_ID orderDetailId, COMMENT_CUSTOMER_NUMBER commentCustomerNumber, COMMENT_CONTENT commentContent, COMMENT_IMAGES commentImages, MODEL_NAME modelName, STORE_NAME storeName FROM gm_comment c, gm_goods g, gm_goods_model gm, gm_store s WHERE c.USER_ID=#{userId} and c.COMMENT_ENABLE=1 and c.GOODS_ID=g.ID and g.MODEL_ID=gm.ID and gm.STORE_ID=s.ID

SELECT COMMENT_SELLER_NUMBER commentSellerNumber, STORE_NAME storeName FROM gm_comment c, gm_store s, gm_goods g, gm_goods_model gm WHERE c.USER_ID=#{userId} and c.COMMENT_ENABLE=1 and c.GOODS_ID=g.ID and g.MODEL_ID=gm.ID and gm.STORE_ID=s.ID
